document.full_text: the united nations investigator on torture on monday accused the u.s. administration of blocking a one-on-one meeting he was seeking with detained "wikileaks" soldier bradley manning.
document.title: u.n. expert "frustrated" with u.s. over wikileaks soldier
lines_and_colors: the united nations investigator on torture on monday accused the u.s. administration of blocking a one-on-one meeting he was seeking with detained "wikileaks" soldier bradley manning.
